values: I haven't wrote because not much is going on.  Partying every day... Thats about it.  Now I have hit my all time low.  I hit rock bottom and bounced.  There is nowhere to go but up...thank God.  God, something I've forgot about for too long.  I still long for a companion.  Valentines day was great this year... had a gorgeous Finnish Date ( she is an exchange student) and then her family wouldnt let her go out.  Fucking great!  I got an MIC on Friday which was fun.  I hate my life.  I hate myself.  Ive said these things before, but they were only hollow words until now.  God has to hate me for forgetting him.  I didnt forget you.. just neglected you.  Im probably going to get drafted, go to war, and die of smallpox or possibly some anthrax.  Wow, look at all I have to look forward to.  Probation, Community service, War, Death.  Only one of those will provide me with peace.  This fatalist attitude is truly depressing, but i know nothing else.  Maybe thats why I havent met any good girls.  Gods pissed and hes about to kill me, thats why he wont let me get attached to anyone or vice versa.  To God:  Let me meet someone who can really love me before my premature death.  Let me know true happiness before you end this misery we call life.  You give us life as a gift, yet it is the source of all pain.  Let me see the happiness that I see everyone around me enjoying.  I see couples, and I die inside.  I have never met a girl who was real.  The only ones I've met want my dick not my words. They might as well be deaf and dumb. That or they decieve and lie and cheat and give pain in place of love.  I'm done with those kinds of people.  I want a real girl.  Someone who can love every single little quirk I have.  Who will love me for who I am not what I could be.  Im done having people trying to mold me into their idea of a perfect man.  LOVE ME FOR WHO AND WHAT I AM OR DO NOT LOVE ME AT ALL.  I've enjoyed pretty faces for long enough.  Now I need a beautiful soul to live behind a pretty face.  But is there such a thing?  It seems to be an oxymoron. Girls with pretty faces are for the most part shallow.  They are ugly.  Their face means nothing to me.  GOD, send me an angel who will bare her soul. Show me the happiness I see all around.  I know only the shadows that plague the light.  Show me love. Real love. No lies, no cheating, no deceptions.  Show me life.

Guest:	 Did you even think about me on our "anniversary"? 
 Auto response from Eroded Mask:	 I am away from my computer right now. 
 Guest:	 I thought about you...   I even went through our book... 
 Guest:	 Listened to what we used to listen to together... even sat by myself at cranberry lake just reminising... 
 Guest:	 Now weve come to the point where I have so much trouble talking to you I can only talk to a blank computer screen that wont talk back 
 Guest:	 maybe thats where I find my comfort, in knowing that you wont react this emotion soaked monologue until long after it was said.... 
 Guest:	 It would be great to be able to say that weve both moved on and are happy.... but is that the case??  Im not happy.. and Im still kind of confused... 
 Guest:	 Ive tried to sort this out lots of times... but my head or my heart just wont forget you... Of course a hears not supposed to forget its first love is it? 
 Guest:	 Yours never did.. 
 Guest:	 Probably still hasnt... 
 Guest:	 I dont know what I was trying to accomplish by doing this... You called to tell me you were thinking about me... maybe this is my way of saying the same thing...

Did you even think about it till it was over?  Thats how it was for me.  Now I cant stop thinking about it.  Im starting to enter that period of depression I face around this time of year.  I didnt even know what depression was before I met her.  Now its an annual devil I must exorcise.  I listen to the same sad songs and sit alone, watching the snow fall.  Its strange, I find some comfort in this... possibly because it is now familiar to me.  I need somthing to break this cycle...  Somthing of the female persuasion.  Happiness will defeat these times. If you happen to see a courier of good times, send him my way.  By the way Felis ano nuevo!

2 more days... Then the trip begins...Friday Im takin some cid... Gonna party hardy all fucking break!!  I just keep telling myself... 2 more days, 2 more days.  I dont really see the point of this anymore.  It used to be an alternative way of communicating with Toni when she wouldnt listen very well... now its just kind of pointless. No one really reads it anyways... Im pondering just saying fuck it.  This journal is laced with bad memmories anyways.  FUCK THE PAST

I missed you today... Sorry I couldnt comfort you when you were sad.          ~J~

From the top of this majestic mountain I shout her name
It shoots through the cold biting air
Until it is a whisper among the gentle hills around
The sun sinks into the jagged peaks spouting spontaneous rays of brilliant light.
This beauty will make you starve...
You will thirst for such immaculate scenes as this.
You may search the barren desert,
or the depths of the grat sea,
and the ony thing able to quench your thirst,
is seeing your reflection in her eyes.

Swim through these Jungle beats
They are fast + fierce devouring energy
The tribe feed on blood + spirit
Created from primordial soup, they thrive in the forest
Waiting for a lost soul to wander their dark depths
The people of the trees are restless for night to come
Hiding from the morning sun to slip away into a deep sleep
Hold this sweet slumber close
The end is cold and near
Crisp like the winter wind
It sends the frigid air to your bones ignroing your pourous skin.
You posess an ancient beauty that has gone unseven for generations
Liberate your feelings and ignore societies wishes
Why must a flower have a stem if the sky can be with out clouds?

Lets take a moment to remember the dumb slizzut who lives down the street.  Lets remember the time she chased me down in her soccer mom mini van to yell at me about going to fast through the neighborhood.  Apparently I was going to " kill her fucking kids"  And she was " scared as hell".... Revenge is so sweet. Lets do some math...
1 40lbs. Pumpkin + 1 Jewish sluts mailbox + a van going 40 mph = One sweet night of revenge...

Weve climbed over the mountain peek
On our way down
Down to the ground
It seems as if gravity has lost its properties
Suspended in the thin crisp air
Dangling by the thin silver cord
Ill never go down
Down to the ground
Ill live in the clouds
Inside the temple of night
There is no return from this..
We've broke on through..
Got in touch with our inner god..
Now we can communincate through him
Use his energy as lips
Now were almost down
Down to the ground
Were there
Thats what we did on Fri night in Ann Arbor.  Sat... I hung out with Kyle. Yesterday Disc Golf.  Sorry this is brief, but class is over.

O Great creator of being...
Find me the light in this world
My eyes see only the tormented
My ears hear only the uncooth
The divine senses that prouce images for my mind to feast on send chills down my spine
Is this ancient story true?
Blind faith seems ignorant at times
And other times there is no option
Place your life into the hands of the great unknown..
There is no repentence for her...
The source of evil for this mortal world is her twisted heart.
Feeding on pain she thrives for tears and sobbing
Her Fufillment brings only darkness
SHe moves through the night soft and swift...
In the dark she comes for me...
I know not fear, only anger..
End the show
The close of the curtain...

Sometimes people misjudge me, and take me for nothing but a stoner.  I despise people who do this. They judge on appearance.  My hipocracy knows no bounds...  I met this girl who I had assumed was just some crazy ditz...  I was laying next to her looking up at the stars and out spills out the philosopher inside this girl..  She starts talking about the heavens above.  Amazing things came from her mouth.. things I hear in my dreams.  I think I really like her.  She gave me just a glance at her soul.. Its my turn to show her mine.

This weekend was amazing...  Friday I went to college with Chris and played football with his new friends.  I kicked all their asses.  They were just a bunch of wussy Christian Private School boys.  On Saturday I went out to dinner with Erin and Lauren.  On the way to the party I ate some really good mushrooms from California.  I started tripping before we got there.  Just as we pulled up they were lighting a blunt on the porch.  I got in the circle and started smoking.  After the blunt I was started to trip really hard core.  I went in and talked to Baldwin for a while.  I dont remeber a thing he said.  I smoked a blunt sized doobie with him and some older drunk dude.  I went and layed on the ground by the TV and stared up at the ceiling.  It turned into all of these pringles guys with mustaches eating eachothers heads and stuff.  I layed there for an hour imaculately entertained.  Kyle called my phone and asked me where I was so he could pick me up.  I was so confused I didnt even know where I was.  I had some girl tell him how to get there.  Then he picked me up and we went to rashids for a party.  We hung out there for a while then walked to Kyles house for the night.  I had to carry Kyle home while I was tripping hard.  I had him on my back and all I could see in the darkness were glowing pink math equations.  It all lasted till about 4 in the morning.  9-4 not bad.  What a night...

This weekend was pretty nuts..  Chris and I went to his college on Friday night.  It included him dressing up as a penguin at Meijers, a visit to Chuckey Cheeses and some other assorted things.  Then we had a suprise party for some chick back at his dorms.  We left at like 1:00 to go and break in to Brandons house.  We put the video camera we had on night vision and snuck up stairs.  Brandon was having some people over so we started fucking with them.  We started tickeling this kids ear with a piece of grass while he was asleep.. he woke up really quick scared and confused.. We drank a bunch of whiskey with them then left.  We went over to Dwaynes at like 4:00 in the morning and went in his hot tub.  Chris said to run if he came.  We got back to Brandons around 5 then crashed on a couch.  
Saturday came around and I found some Hydro shit for me and chris.  We played disc golf twice then he dropped me off at my house.  I had a sweet ass weekend.  Yesterday, I hung out with Piankai and a bunch of cokeheads.. Me and Jim watched these kids do line after line.  It was offered but I didnt want any.  We rolled a 51er with that hydro and got messed up for the rest of the day.  I had sooooo much fun this weekend.  I wish I had someone to share all these experiences with. It almost makes me want to go back to where I was a year ago ( and who I was with).  This solitude is killing me, but Ill never go back to that.  Not ever.

Listen to my teachings
Learn the way of The King
No longer will you guilt
In this kingdom I've built
Invisible to the corrupt
Blinded by the conformity of society
THey would plague my land
Their feet will not touch the grace of this sand
They will parrish as fools
Together in there ignorance
The Lizard King is back
And he's here to save your soul

Can you hear it?
The Forgotten silence
This is the Kings philosiphy
Dont come cryin to me
If you dont like it
Its the law of my land
Done take a stand
Cause you'll lose it all
You're life and your mind
Are gone with the season
Revolt and its treason
Punnishable by death
Ill save your last breath
And burn it in my fire
Your funeral pyre
You can have it all
Stand behind me
Fear me 
Fear is respect 
Fear is power
Hail to The Lizard King
He owns you

Fill my pocket full of posies
Cause Im goin on a walk
Away from Fear
Away from time
Come stand on sacred mosses
The forest is quiet with echos distant
The soft sound of the sea beneath
Waves sending magic spirals up
Towards the heavens with our voices

Together we ascend upon the snowhite caps of the mystic land
Explore the depths of its cold bleeding heart
Swim in the river of esence
Its water gives life and rebirth
Change your mind with the golden rapids

It fell dark over the deep elder trees
Creatures of night abounding
Only glare from the animals eyes is seen in this place
All else is unholy
Welcome to my subconcious

You are some psycho bitch with self-centered values.  The only person you ever cared about is yourself.  But its only human instinct to be greedy right?  You take it to an extreme... you do it in access and you say fuck whoevers in your way. Gently they stir, gently rise.
The dead are newborn awakening
With ravaged limbs and wet souls,
Gently they sigh in rapt funeral amazement.
Who called these dead to dance?
Was it the young woman learning to play the ghost song on her baby grand?
Was it the wilderness children?
Was it the ghost god himself, stuttering, cheering, chatting blindly?
I called you up to anoint the earth.
I called you to announce sadness falling like burned skin.
I called to wish you well,
To glory in self like a new monster.
And now I call on you to pray.

I pressed her thigh, and death smiled...

Let's reinvent the gods, all the myths
of the ages

Celebrate symbols from deep elder forests

[Have you forgotten the lessons of the ancient war]

We need great golden copulations

The fathers are cackling in trees

of the forest

Our mother is dead in the sea

Do you know we are being led to
slaughters by placid admirals

& that fat slow generals are getting
obscene on young blood

Do you know we are ruled by T.V.

the moon is a dry blood beast

Guerrilla bands are rolling numbers
in the next block of green vine

amassing for warfare on innocent
herdsmen who are just dying

O great creator of being

grant us one more hour to
perform our art
& perfect our lives

bottom and back up again...IT WAS HELL!!! God, it took like 4 hours but now 
I have somethign to brag about...heh. Although now I have poison ive on the 
back of my thighs (an unusual place???) and about a million cuts (there's no 
trail so we basically went through thistles, scraped rocks, and much else). 
Sigh, I wish you would have done it with me. Also I watched a great Mexican 
film, amoresperro, if you get time you should see it...love those 
international films, but we usually dotn get them here because were so 
fucking uncultured in these them parts...

Last week I was at sherdain lake with brennan, he doesnt swim, so i swam out 
into the lake by myself and just kind of floated and looked up at the stars 
and wished that you were with me. when you come back im going to take you 
swimming there under the stars no matter how damn cold it is!!!

Thats so awesome about your school, i know things will go well for you. but 
dammit i wish you were here...

Siempre Tus, Emilia

Let me elaborate on last night.... Went to Steve-O's watched the game... went swimmin at Jordans.  We played sharks and minnows for like 3 hrs. It was actually pretty sweet.  Then I went home to shower and shit, then Yasmin calls.  She calls me all the frickin time saying she feels "frisky" and she wants me to come over.  G-R-O-S-S!  I cut to the chase, I told the mother fuckin slut to her face.  Then I went back to Steves and we left for Arts Buds and Nugs.  First we went to this party at Bergios and hung out for a bit.  There was this kid there who was about to get his ass kicked.  It was sweet.  They blocked him in this little court and was gonna kick his ass.  Then nothing happened so we  started to leave.  Then we saw Alison and CC there.  They said they wanted to go with us so... we put them in the back of the Suburban and left. We arrived a little to late and almost everything was closed.  We still had a sweet time.  Jordan and Greg stole mexican hats from one of the stands and wore them around for a while.  Gregs hat was actually a cornacopia and it looked like a Harry Potter hat.  We all had a great time and the girls were fun too.  I think were goin back today.
Went to a party at Bergios... then went to arts beats and eats... Fun time.. hung out with chicks... it was sweet.... Im out

Last night was gay... went to Kory's house and watched a movie with the commons.  Anthony and I made our escape to visit Mary Jane down at the beach.  Tonight Im definately going to Arts Beats and Eats.  I cant wait, I wanted to go really bad last night, but nobody would drive us.  Ill try to slip some greens from the rents so I have a little spending money.  Till then...

sorry i havent written in a while, ive been completely bogged down by the 
arrival of the fall semester...god i have such horrible classes and 
teachers, and our school is just so annoying, and likewise all men seem kind 
of blah compared to you. or else they're gay...hmm ( but all closeted of 
course becaues our school is totally closed-minded)

the passing weeks angst is now a mere memory, although some has overflowed 
to this week, im just completely void of emotion now though, im just a stoic 
greek observing from the outside it seems

im so sick of high school, its like dammit i know im smarter than you people 
but yet i have to lower my IQ to socialize with you...its really 
frusterating.

when are you coming? thats really ridiculous about your car, even from my 
limited knowledge about automobiles i know that it doesnt take that 
long...but maybe i just want to see you again so much that every day seems 
like a lifetime

i wish i could think of better and more interesting things to say but i have 
a huge psychology project to start working on - so ill write soon agaign 
hopefully

love always, emilia

If she has all the qualities that youre looking for then whats the worst that could happen?  Hearing the word "no" isnt so bad.  Everyone hears it many times every day, yet there is no mental damage done.  Get some balls.. go after that supermodel, you've got nothing to lose.  If they're stuck up, then you wouldnt want to be with someone like that anyways.

Thats where women have the advantage.  When a mans eyes meet with a womens it is a compitition.  Mens eyes are naturally drawn to womens  breast.  Look at the breast for instance.  You have the entire breast, which forms a perfect symmetrical circle.  Then the areola which forms a perfect circle inside of the larger one.  And finally the nipple, the center of the three circles.  Now, step back and think about it.  Womens breast are symetrical bullseyes.  Their bodies form perfect lines that direct you where to go.  They "V" thats formed near the hips is a perfect arrow just screaming "go here, touch here!"  Women are such a nobel species.  They carry on your name on after you die.  I love women.

When the still sea conspires an armor 
And her sullen and aborted 
Currents breed tiny monsters 
True sailing is dead 
Awkward instant 
And the first animal is jettisoned 
Legs furiously pumping 
Their stiff green gallop 
And heads bob up 
Poise 
Delicate 
Pause 
Consent 
In mute nostril agony 
Carefully refined 
And sealed over

Im comming soon
Just for a second of your time
Sorry if I stretch it out
Over a year or so
Cause I cant bear this pain
Another minute

Ill be there in the morning
With lonly love to give
Its all I have in my empty bag
In there with my empty heart

Im running on fumes
And lack spare change
But Im here with you now
So dont waste any time
Its our time to shine
Cause Im leavin soon
Oh too soon

We have a two week history
But its been stretched 
Over a year or so
And nothings changed
Except the tired face I wear

Ill never be done with you
Ill stretch us
Over a life or so
Seeking shelter within you

Time is slowly fading
And I am always waiting
For somthing fun to do

Stop whisperin
Start Shoutin
This is it
Then end of everything we had
So enjoy this

This fire is buring good
Were running out of wood

This watch is useless
I dont even want to know

Cause its time to leave
Just leave the scene

I wonder where you are
Lost in your own dark

Im goin away soon
Im goin to see this through

Computer class is boring.. I cant wait to get home, I hope I no ones there.  Its only 9:15...2:10 sounds soo far away.  Im about ready for my 9:30 nap.  Pottery was sweet this morning.  I made this sweet bowl.. bowl that you eat out of... and IM not talking weed-ies.  I made a legit bowl.  I want my own f-ing car back.. Im soo tired of getting picked up every morning.  IM about ready to take myself.  Paul ( WING NUT) is sitting next to me playing fantasy football.  What a productive work hour!

Remember when it was good?

The stars and the cool jeweled moon were watching

done.

Last night... me and Chris jumped off peoples docks that we didnt know at like 11:45!  That was the high point of last night..  Today, I went to the car show at bakers.  Met Fleece and Nick there.  Went to nicks.. Nick and I went to Kensington and threw a disc around.  I was happy that I got to throw a disc at all.  My dad was being gay and made me come home early.  What fun!!  Anyways... Back to school tomarrow... Damnit..  I had a pretty boring weekend , yet it was still a lot of fun.  Im easily ammused.  I need to find a local version of Emily.  Dont worry I will provail.  God I miss her..  I dont think any girl will look as good as Emily does.  She had everything I could have wante.  Why God did you forsake my wishes and put me such a distance from my girl?  It shouldnt be like this.  It just shouldnt be like this.
  But!! Instead of bitching about it Im just going to deal.  Ill see her in the next couple of weeks.  Till then may the muse of love find me and heal my wounds...

School...
Dark corners filled with unamused souls
Mindless zombies

No mental requirements

An emptyness
Deepth within the depths of my soul
Once filled with you
Once filled and protected by Summer rays
Seasons change
And I an empty
Summers lent protection ran out on me O too quickly
Im waiting impaciently
Till I see your face once again
Till I feel your grace once again
Im left empty
Empty to this world that offers little love
It would rather kill me
Than nourish me
Pain and self anguish are brought in with the cold winter wind...
There is no light in this darkness
